Description:
.Our client is a Real Estate Company. They are now looking for an MIS Executive to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:To analyse, design, implement and manage computerized information systems in an organizational environment.
To support the efficient running of the business by providing information on data at various levels
Creating MIS documentation to facilitate efficient operations and simple system upkeep
Ensuring the privacy of all customers, employees and company records
Supplying resources and training required for subordinates to install and maintain new software programmes etcSkills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners
Experience in queue management (email/CHAT/Calls).
Experience with Workforce Management software.
Must have experience in Call Centre/BPO Environment

Prior experience with Power BI
Good working knowledge of MIS tools, applications, and concepts.
Excellent command of both written and spoken English.
